importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: Kada Scott was last seen at her workplace on this date, marking the beginning of the investigation into her disappearance.
The remains of an unidentified female were found in a shallow grave two weeks after Scott's disappearance, leading to renewed public and official attention on the case.
A man, Keon King, was arrested and charged with Scott's kidnapping on this date, signaling a major development in the investigation.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: This two-week period from Scott's disappearance to the discovery of remains and the arrest of Keon King represents a critical escalation in the investigation and public concern.

keyTakeAways: A 23-year-old Philadelphia woman, Kada Scott, went missing on October 4, 2025, and her human remains were later found in a shallow grave behind an abandoned school in a wooded area.
Police believe Keon King, a 21-year-old man, is responsible for Scott’s kidnapping, based on phone communication tracking and a prior similar case involving domestic kidnapping and assault.
King is charged with the kidnapping of Kada Scott and with a prior case involving the kidnapping and assault of another woman, suggesting a pattern of criminal behavior.
The discovery of remains was prompted by a specific anonymous tip, which led authorities to the site; prior searches had only found Scott’s belongings, not her body.
A gold 1999 Toyota Camry linked to King was found in a parking lot after a public tip and is now under investigation as a potential vehicle used in Scott’s disappearance.
Scott was last seen at her workplace and disconnected from her phone and social media, indicating a sudden and complete disappearance.
The Philadelphia Police Department and FBI’s Violent Crime Task Force are jointly investigating the case, emphasizing its severity and complexity.
Scott’s family has repeatedly urged the public to come forward with any information, emphasizing that even small details could be vital to solving the case.

summaryOfNewsArticle: A 23-year-old Philadelphia woman, Kada Scott, went missing on October 4, 2025, after disconnecting from her phone and social media at her workplace. Two weeks later, her remains were found in a shallow grave behind an abandoned school, prompting renewed investigation. Police believe Keon King, a 21-year-old man with a prior kidnapping and assault case, is responsible, based on phone tracking and a history of similar criminal behavior. A specific anonymous tip led to the discovery of the remains and also helped locate a gold 1999 Toyota Camry linked to King. The case is being investigated by the Philadelphia Police Department and the FBI’s Violent Crime Task Force. Authorities are seeking public assistance to uncover more evidence, and Scott’s family continues to express deep concern over her safety and disappearance.
title: Police Investigating Disappearance of Philadelphia Woman Find Human Remains in Shallow Grave, Suspect Arrested
